column4: I am trying to install grub from knoppix, but I cannot add deps to knoppix to compile grub, anyone?
if you have an installed system - you can boot a live cd, chroot over to the installed system (mount it  and proc and /dev properly) and rerun update-grub

yes. You boot a live cd. and chroot over.  that url site mentioned how you need to set up (mount /proc and /dev also) http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=210820 if you want to learn whats going on.
